title: Agentic Commerce Platform
description: Building AI-first commerce infrastructure enabling autonomous purchasing and decision-making agents.
fullDescription: A next-generation commerce platform designed for AI agents to autonomously make purchasing decisions, negotiate terms, and execute transactions on behalf of businesses.
problem: Current commerce infrastructure isn't designed for machine-to-machine transactions and autonomous agents.
constraints: Must be backward compatible with existing payment rails. Required explainable decision-making for audit.
approach: Building API-first platform with agent authentication, decision logging, and configurable guardrails.
tradeoffs: Prioritizing security and auditability over speed-to-market. Choosing conservative initial scope.
execution: Currently in development at SYNVRA with small founding team.
outcomes: In active development. Early partnerships with AI commerce companies established.
whatIdImprove: Too early to sayâ€”currently in build phase.
